00052 enum Error_e { EXTRACT_FAILURE = 1000, EXTRACT_TOO_MANY };
00053 
00063 template<class T>
00064 class ValueExtractor 
00065 {
00066   friend class MultiArg<T>;
00067   
00068   private:
00069 
00074        std::vector<T> &_values;
00075   
00080     ValueExtractor(std::vector<T> &values) : _values(values) {}
00081   
00087     int extractValue( const std::string& val ) 
00088     {
00089       T temp;
00090 
00091 #if defined(HAVE_SSTREAM)
00092       std::istringstream is(val);
00093 #elif defined(HAVE_STRSTREAM)
00094       std::istrstream is(val.c_str());
00095 #else
00096 #error "Need a stringstream (sstream or strstream) to compile!"
00097 #endif
00098 
00099       int valuesRead = 0;
00100     
00101       while ( is.good() ) 
00102       {
00103         if ( is.peek() != EOF )
00104           is >> temp; 
00105         else
00106           break;
00107       
00108         valuesRead++;
00109       }    
00110     
00111       if ( is.fail() )
00112         return EXTRACT_FAILURE;
00113     
00114       if ( valuesRead > 1 )
00115         return EXTRACT_TOO_MANY;
00116     
00117       _values.push_back(temp);
00118     
00119       return 0;
00120     } 
00121 };
00122 
00128 template<>
00129 class ValueExtractor<std::string> 
00130 {
00131   friend class MultiArg<std::string>;
00132 
00133      private:
00134 
00139         std::vector<std::string> &_values;
00140   
00145         ValueExtractor(std::vector<std::string> &values) : _values(values) {}
00146 
00152         int extractValue( const std::string& val ) 
00153     {
00154             _values.push_back( val );
00155             return 0;
00156         }
00157 };

00401 template<class T>
00402 const std::vector<T>& MultiArg<T>::getValue() { return _values; }

00404 template<class T>
00405 bool MultiArg<T>::processArg(int *i, std::vector<std::string>& args) 
00406 {
00407    if ( _ignoreable && Arg::ignoreRest() )
00408     return false;
00409 
00410   if ( _hasBlanks( args[*i] ) )
00411     return false;
00412 
00413   std::string flag = args[*i];
00414   std::string value = "";
00415 
00416      trimFlag( flag, value );
00417 
00418      if ( argMatches( flag ) )
00419      {
00420        if ( Arg::delimiter() != ' ' && value == "" )
00421       throw( ArgParseException( 
00422                  "Couldn't find delimiter for this argument!",
00423              toString() ) );
00424 
00425     // always take the first one, regardless of start string
00426     if ( value == "" )
00427     {
00428       (*i)++;
00429       if ( static_cast<unsigned int>(*i) < args.size() )
00430         _extractValue( args[*i] );
00431       else
00432         throw( ArgParseException("Missing a value for this argument!",
00433                                          toString() ) );
00434     } 
00435     else
00436       _extractValue( value );
00437 
00438     /*
00439     // continuing taking the args until we hit one with a start string 
00440     while ( (unsigned int)(*i)+1 < args.size() &&
00441         args[(*i)+1].find_first_of( Arg::flagStartString() ) != 0 &&
00442             args[(*i)+1].find_first_of( Arg::nameStartString() ) != 0 ) 
00443         _extractValue( args[++(*i)] );
00444     */
00445 
00446     _alreadySet = true;
00447     _checkWithVisitor();
00448 
00449     return true;
00450   }
00451   else
00452     return false;
00453 }

00460 {
00461   std::string id = Arg::shortID(_typeDesc) + " ... ";
00462

00469 template<class T>
00470 std::string MultiArg<T>::longID(const std::string& val) const
00471 {
00472   std::string id = Arg::longID(_typeDesc) + "  (accepted multiple times)";
00473 
00474   return id;

00481 template<class T>
00482 bool MultiArg<T>::isRequired() const
00483 {
00484   if ( _required )
00485   {
00486     if ( _values.size() > 1 )
00487       return false;
00488     else
00489       return true;
00490      }
00491      else
00492     return false;
00493 
00494 }
00495 
00496 template<class T>
00497 void MultiArg<T>::_extractValue( const std::string& val ) 
00498 {
00499   MULTI_ARG_HELPER::ValueExtractor<T> ve(_values);
00500       
00501   int err = ve.extractValue(val);
00502 
00503   if ( err == MULTI_ARG_HELPER::EXTRACT_FAILURE )
00504     throw( ArgParseException("Couldn't read argument value "
00505                                  "from string '" + val + "'", toString() ) );
00506 
00507   if(err == MULTI_ARG_HELPER::EXTRACT_TOO_MANY)
00508       throw( ArgParseException("More than one valid value "
00509                                  "parsed from string '" + val + "'", 
00510                  toString() ) );        
00511   if ( _constraint != NULL )
00512     if ( ! _constraint->check( _values.back() ) )
00513       throw( CmdLineParseException( "Value '" + val +
00514                                           "' does not meet constraint: " +
00515                                           _constraint->description(), 
00516                       toString() ) );
00517 }
00518     
00519 template<class T>
00520 bool MultiArg<T>::allowMore()
00521 {
00522   bool am = _allowMore;
00523   _allowMore = true;
00524   return am;
00525 }
